Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.web

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.web.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, Runnable, EventListener
public class Server extends Object implements Runnable, PropertyChangeListener
After the server has been created, this class Server is used to handle multiple Socket Connections from different clients.
Author:
Alessio Piovesan, Pier Giorgio Prosperi, Matteo Salamone
See Also:
Runnable

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • lobby

      public void lobby​(SocketServerToClient socketToClient, String name, int playersRequired, Integer id)
      Class Lobby is used to create a virtual room where players wait to join a game. The first player who starts the server will be the Host of the game, others can join the same match by using a Game ID provided by the Host.
      Parameters:
      socketToClient - of type SocketServerToClient - Socket that represents the connection with a Client
      name - of type String - Player's nickname
      playersRequired - of type Int - Number of Players
      id - of type Integer - id of the Game that is about to start

    • joinNewGame

      private void joinNewGame​(SocketServerToClient socketToClient, String name, int playersRequired, Integer id)
      Method joinNewGame let the 2nd, 3rd and 4th player join an existing game, or sends them to a new game
      Parameters:
      socketToClient - is the player socket that wants to join the game
      name - is the player nickname
      playersRequired - is the number of players that still have to join the game before the game starts
      id - is the game id selected by the player that wants to join

    • startGame

      private void startGame​(int playersRequired, Integer id)
      Method startGame creates the game when all the players have joined
      Parameters:
      playersRequired - is the number of spots left to star the game
      id - is the game id selected by the player that wants to join

    • sendNickname

      private void sendNickname​(int n, Integer id)
      Method sendNickname send to all the players each nickname that is playing the game
      Parameters:
      n - is the number of players
      id - is the game id

    • createNewGame

      private void createNewGame​(SocketServerToClient socketToClient, String name, int playersRequired)
      Method createNewGame lets the first player create a new game
      Parameters:
      socketToClient - is the player socket that wants to join the game
      name - is the player nickname
      playersRequired - is the number of player that the first player wants to join the game, himself included

    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection​(SocketServerToClient socketToClient)
      Method used in case a Player decides to leave the game.
      Parameters:
      socketToClient - of type SocketServerToClient - Socket that represents the connection with a Client

      private void addPlayer​(String name, int id)

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(String name)

    • checkExistNickname

      public void checkExistNickname​(String name, SocketServerToClient socket)
      Method checkExistNickname checks whether a new Nickname already exists inside the server.
      Parameters:
      name - of type String - Player's Nickname
      socket - of type SocketServerToClient - Socket that represents the connection with a client

    • firstRes

      public void firstRes​(SocketServerToClient socket)
      Method firstRes sends to the 2nd, 3rd and 4th player the request to choose the initial resources before the game starts
      Parameters:
      socket - is the socket chosen by the first player

    • rejoin

      public void rejoin​(int id, String name, SocketServerToClient socketServerToClient)
      Method rejoin is used when a player disconnects accidentally from the game
      Parameters:
      id - is the game id
      name - is the player's nickname
      socketServerToClient - is the player's socket that wants to rejoin the game

      private void updateAllBoard​(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Method updateAllBoard updates every single player board at the end of the turn
      Parameters:
      evt - is a property change event

    • sendMarket

      private void sendMarket​(String marketString, int n, int id)
      Method sendMarket takes the market string and sends a message to all the clients
      Parameters:
      marketString - is the string version of the market
      n - the number of players
      id - the id of the selected player

    • sendExternalMarble

      private void sendExternalMarble​(Colours extern, int n, int id)
      Method sendExternalMarble sends a message to all the clients that the external marble as changed
      Parameters:
      extern - is the colour of the external marble
      n - is the number of the players
      id - is the id of the selected player
